column2:
"Ah, <%me>!
What a coincidence, meeting you here!"
"I wanted to converse with the Lillipans, so I asked Fourier for help, but..."
"Lilili! Lilili!"
"Ahh, it's alright. Matoi is part of ARKS, she's not an enemy!"
"Lii! Lii!"
"...I'm sorry. For some reason, they seem to be on their guard."
"I wonder... if I did anything to scare them."
"No, I've been with you since the beginning, so there shouldn't have been..."
"Lii! Lili! Lililii!"
"Hmm... Rather than disliking you, it seems they are trying to push you away."
"And it seems to only be Matoi. Does any reason come to mind?"
"Even if you say that... I haven't really done anything around here, though..."
"Could it be something that happened in the past?"
"Looks like it can't be helped."
"That's even harder to think about... I can't remember anything."
"Mmm...I guess you're right. It might have been something in the past that I forgot about."
"...Thank you, Fourier. I don't want to trouble the Lillipans anymore. I'll head back for now."
"I'm sorry, Matoi. I couldn't be of much help..."
"No, no, showing me the way to meet these Lillipans is already enough."
"Till now, I've only been able to hear about them. Just being able to meet them like this, makes me happy enough."
"Let's come again sometime. These guys should definitely welcome you next time!"
"Yeah, sure!"
